<file>
00276|   const alternatives: Record<string, string[]> = {
00277|     'good': ['great', 'excellent', 'wonderful', 'fantastic', 'superb'],
00278|     'bad': ['poor', 'terrible', 'awful', 'horrible', 'dreadful'],
00279|     'big': ['large', 'huge', 'massive', 'enormous', 'gigantic'],
00280|     'small': ['tiny', 'little', 'compact', 'miniature', 'petite'],
00281|     'fast': ['quick', 'rapid', 'swift', 'speedy', 'brisk'],
00282|     'slow': ['gradual', 'leisurely', 'sluggish', 'unhurried', 'steady'],
00283|     'important': ['crucial', 'vital', 'essential', 'significant', 'critical'],
00284|     'beautiful': ['gorgeous', 'stunning', 'lovely', 'attractive', 'magnificent'],
00285|     'happy': ['joyful', 'cheerful', 'delighted', 'pleased', 'elated'],
00286|     'sad': ['unhappy', 'sorrowful', 'melancholy', 'dejected', 'gloomy'],
00287|     'very': ['extremely', 'incredibly', 'remarkably', 'exceptionally', 'tremendously'],
00288|     'really': ['truly', 'genuinely', 'actually', 'indeed', 'certainly'],
00289|     'said': ['stated', 'mentioned', 'declared', 'expressed', 'remarked'],
00290|     'make': ['create', 'produce', 'build', 'construct', 'generate'],
00291|     'think': ['believe', 'consider', 'suppose', 'assume', 'reckon'],
00292|     'know': ['understand', 'realize', 'recognize', 'comprehend', 'grasp'],
00293|     'help': ['assist', 'support', 'aid', 'guide', 'facilitate'],
00294|     'work': ['function', 'operate', 'perform', 'labor', 'serve'],
00295|     'easy': ['simple', 'effortless', 'straightforward', 'uncomplicated', 'manageable'],
00296|     'hard': ['difficult', 'challenging', 'tough', 'demanding', 'complex'],
00297|     // Clothing and accessories
00298|     'shoes': ['footwear', 'sneakers', 'boots', 'sandals', 'loafers'],
00299|     'clothes': ['clothing', 'garments', 'attire', 'apparel', 'outfit'],
00300|     'shirt': ['blouse', 'top', 'jersey', 'tee', 'garment'],
00301|     'pants': ['trousers', 'slacks', 'jeans', 'bottoms', 'legwear'],
00302|     // Common verbs
00303|     'go': ['travel', 'move', 'proceed', 'head', 'journey'],
00304|     'come': ['arrive', 'approach', 'reach', 'appear', 'return'],
00305|     'see': ['observe', 'notice', 'view', 'spot', 'witness'],
00306|     'get': ['obtain', 'acquire', 'receive', 'gain', 'fetch'],
00307|     'take': ['grab', 'seize', 'pick', 'collect', 'carry'],
00308|     'give': ['provide', 'offer', 'present', 'deliver', 'grant'],
00309|     // Common nouns
00310|     'house': ['home', 'residence', 'dwelling', 'property', 'abode'],
00311|     'car': ['vehicle', 'automobile', 'auto', 'transport', 'ride'],
00312|     'food': ['meal', 'cuisine', 'dish', 'nourishment', 'sustenance'],
00313|     'book': ['novel', 'volume', 'publication', 'text', 'manuscript'],
00314|     'time': ['period', 'moment', 'duration', 'interval', 'era'],
00315|     'place': ['location', 'spot', 'area', 'site', 'venue']
00316|   }
00317|   
00318|   return alternatives[word.toLowerCase()] || []
00319| }
